snippet.title: Creature Lab - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Creature Lab is a first-person horror mad scientist simulation game where players will manage resources like bodies, chemical substances, and more. Use the city map to plan your next move by monitoring military activity, substance availability, and districts with special buildings. Assemble your mutant army, attaching different limbs, and enhancing them to give them unique abilities. Creature Lab is launching on June 14 to PC with a console release at a later date.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
